review: Great piece of gear and reliable.
author: Matthew Olson

review: Great product , easy to set up and easy to use .
author: Johnny Bravo

review: It's ok.  Comcast is not on the list as a supported cable co for some apps. I do like that i can now stream Netflix on another tv... it is cool to have so many choices for something to watch.
author: Sarah

review: Locks up while using YouTube and locks up navigating other apps sometimes requiring returning to the home screen and starting over.Prime music isn't really user friendly on this device and does not allow any type of search for music only a browse of playlist or music that has been added by a different device.
author: 812b4

review: I love the fire Tv stick. A must for prime members. Quality is better than Netflix, a ton of new an unique content. A bunch of apps on the stick that stream free movies. Reasonably priced rentals. Can play games on tv through different apps. Seriously considering cancelling cable now.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Paired with Plex this device does everything I need in an entertainment endpoint
author: thomas vance
